ygData.subject: Was Spell Search, Now Research
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to all who answered my questions about where to find spells. I now have everyhting I need after shopping in Freeport. I was not able to find Banshee
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks to all who answered my questions about where to find spells. I now
have everyhting I need after shopping in Freeport. I was not able to find
Banshee Aura. I am told this is a spell that must be researched.
I have some questions about research.

I made level 16 and went to my guild. I was only able to train one point
into research. Is this normal? If so, why do I have 50 practice points saved
up.... Nevertheless, I do have some questions. How do I research? I think
there is a book I'm supposed to buy, but don't know the title. Will it tell
me how to research spells? Is research like smithing where I will be
combining things in attempts to get a success? Does each spell have a
separate "recipe" or do I just combine the same things and see what happens?
And lastly, I saw a whole bunch of books for sale which I suspect are
related to research, With titles like Calling Forth the Darkness. How do I
know these books are for necromancers or not? Any help would be great.
Thanks....

Dave

----- Original Message -----
From: <nmajsa@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 12:13 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Spell Search


> From: nmajsa@...
>
>
>
>
> >>If anyone knows where these spells can be found, please let me know. I
have
> searched all of Akanon and am losing the life that once drove me. My
undying
> gratitude to any who answer the call.<<
>
>
> I found the majority of the 16th level spells in Freeport... You have to
check
> a lot of different vendors (theres about 8 of them) under the city but
most of
> them are there...
>
>
>
>
>
